comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Politicians here attach much significance to the arrival at the Hoffman House of ex-Gov. William J. Stone of Missouri, who, in the absence of United States Senator J.K. Jones abroad, is practically at the head of the Democratic National Committee, which will meet in special session at Chicago next week Here is article about him at Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Joel_Stone Full name: William Joel Stone. He was born in 1848, so if this photo was taken in 1912 (during the election) he would be age 64. He was a senator representing Missouri from 1903-1918.
